display

Class AnswerPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • display.AnswerPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class AnswerPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class is a cardLayout of 4 buttons that present the possible answers of a question / the explanation to that question.
    Author:
    Patrick Created by Patrick Finnerty, this program allows for the creation of quiz for (but not restricted to) learning purposes.     • Constructor Detail

      • AnswerPanel

        public AnswerPanel()
        Constructor by default The buttons and explanation are created.

      • AnswerPanel

        public AnswerPanel(Question q)
        Constructor This time the buttons will be initialised with the answers given by the question. The explanation will also be stored inside
        Parameters:
        q - the question which is going to be used right away
